title: Has the national inventory website been edited after Jared Kouchner's comments?
subtitle: On April 2, 2020, Jared Kouchner said about the federal inventory: "It's supposed to be our stock. They're not supposed to be the state stockpiles they use anymore."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The text on the Government website for strategic national stocks was amended following Jared Kushner ' s remarks during a press conference in April 2020.
